short_summary: Bulk United States of America (U.S.A) Real Estate and Property Data (re: Canadian residents)
description: The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) intends to enter into a contract with a single contractor for the provision of historical bulk data for residential and commercial property located in the U.S.A., where a Canadian is party to a real estate transaction (purchase/sale or transfer). The period of any resulting Contract will be for 30 days.
